trans-unit.source: Creates a Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma assinatura <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> (Algoritmo de Assinatura Digital).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance of the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: A instância do <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> (Algoritmo de Assinatura Digital) que contém a chave.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a serem assinados.

trans-unit.source: Creates the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) PKCS #1 signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Cria a assinatura PKCS nº 1 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> (Algoritmo de Assinatura Digital) para os dados especificados.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital para os dados especificados.

trans-unit.source: The resulting signature data can be verified by using <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de assinatura resultante podem ser verificados usando <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The OID is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O OID é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The DSA key is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A chave DSA é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for the signature formatter.
trans-unit.target: O nome do algoritmo de hash a ser usado para o formatador de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hash algorithm for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature formatter.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o algoritmo de hash para o formatador de assinatura <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> (Algoritmo de Assinatura Digital).

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="strName" /> parameter does not map to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" /> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="strName" /> não é mapeado para o algoritmo de hash <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> que contém a chave.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the key to be used for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature formatter.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a chave a ser usada para o formatador de assinatura <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> (Algoritmo de Assinatura Digital).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> é <see langword="null" />.
